title: Design culture and somaesthetics conference Budapest
description: Conference in dialogue between post-disciplinary fields

title: THE PROMISE OF PRAGMATIST AESTHETICS: Looking Forward after 30 Years.
Atmospheres and Architectonics
description: This conference ambitions to call on a dialogue between outstanding experts in some neighboring fields that are relevant to get a better knowledge and use of architectural and spatial atmospheres, both in material and digital realms.
